summary: Working on the metrics query platform.

Worked on [logical replication](https://www.cockroachlabs.com/docs/stable/change-data-capture-overview) and low-level streaming. Scaled workloads that move terabytes of data with high throughput and low resource usage.
Empowering data science across the company by working on [compilers for feature engineering](https://www.facebook.com/watch/?v=1073947483052122).
Building new SQL features with Go in [CockroachDB](https://github.com/cockroachdb/cockroach) and improving cluster performance & observability.
Working on the backend of a real-time ad serving/auctions system made mostly with Ruby on Rails.
Building recommender systems, ETL pipelines, and even some front end features in React.
Extending APIs, microservices, and workflows to improve security and add automation to several projects.
Revamping developer infrastructure and automating CI/CD using Docker and Azure services.
